meanings.definition: A person who writes under the name of another.
meanings.sent1: The subwriter signed the book with a different name.
meanings.sent2: The subwriter's work was published under a pseudonym.
meanings.sent3: The subwriter pretended to be someone else when writing the story.
meanings.sent4: Being a subwriter is like being a ghost in the literary world.
meanings.sent5: The role of a subwriter is to remain anonymous while creating captivating content.

meanings.definition: To write under the name of another.
meanings.sent1: She decided to subwrite the novel for her friend.
meanings.sent2: He subwrites articles for various magazines using different names.
meanings.sent3: The author asked her to subwrite the autobiography in her style.
meanings.sent4: Subwriting allows writers to explore different genres under a pen name.
meanings.sent5: To subwrite effectively, one must adapt to various writing styles seamlessly.
